title: Spanish Garlic Shrimp (Gambas al Ajillo)
ingredients: 1 pound frozen large shrimp (21-25 count) - thawed, peeled, and deveined
method: Step 2: Place shrimp in a large bowl and season with paprika and kosher salt; mix well to coat.
Step 3: Slice garlic into thin slices. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; add garlic and cook until golden, about 2 minutes.
Step 4: Add shrimp and increase heat to high. Toss and turn shrimp with tongs until starting to curl but still undercooked, about 2 minutes.
Step 5: Pour in sherry. Cook, stirring continuously, until sauce comes up to a boil and shrimp is cooked through, about 1 minute more.
Step 6: Remove from heat. Stir in parsley.
